title: Molded Hemispherical Bowl
description: Pale green faience bowl, hemispherical, moulded. Exterior completely covered with series of acanthus (?) leaves in raised relief, the midriff of each leaf in darker green, the ends alternately in brown and dark green; long, vertical strip of brown glaze on alternating leaves. On exterior base, two superimposed rosettes in high relief.  Interior of bowl glazed white with border of green leaf band.
section: The Ptolemaic Period and the Beginning of the Roman Period

museum_location.name: 19th Dynasty to Roman Period, Martha A. and Robert S. Rubin Gallery, 3rd Floor

If you have any information regarding this work and rights to it, please contact copyright@brooklynmuseum.org.

completeness.name: Good
completeness.description: Most data is approved, but records have not been fully vetted. Many objects have quality photos and descriptions.
